titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/30/1987--Introduced. Elects Representative David E. Skaggs, Colorado, to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology, and Representatives David E. Price, North Carolina, and Matthew G. Martinez, California, to the House Committee on Small Business.
